title: Got perm-banned for doing nothing??
body:
Just got perm banned after getting falsed reported keep this in mind I spent over 300 dollars on League. Here are the logs I've received when I was 
banned. I asked the Xin if he's retarded one time because he was verbal abusing me and saying I was bronze etc.


Game 1
ProsDoPvP: fun times Yas
ProsDoPvP: ctrl 6
ProsDoPvP: if you have it
ProsDoPvP: or 6
ProsDoPvP: 5
ProsDoPvP: luc vs cait

ProsDoPvP: you guys are going to win zyra no skin.

replies.body:
You're right. 

That chat, by itself would not have been a permaban. It likely would have only been a chat restriction. However, all of your other punishments and warnings were taken into account since you managed to accrue so many punishments in a short time without showing any signs of reform. There is an escalation schedule in place to apply harsher punishments to players that refuse to reform after multiple punishments. Your last punishment informed you that it was your FINAL warning.
I can't even get a do-over and if I'm ever toxic again. Banned no exceptions?
Well, according to your chat logs it's a smurf so why care? heh
Because I spent a lot of money. Don't want that to go to waste. From Christmas money birthday money.

You should have thought of that before.
You broke the rules, more than once, now you face the consequences

How many chances do you expect Riot to give you? I agree the chat wasn't horrible but you were warned multiple times and you disregarded those warnings. You'd think after the second or third warning you'd either be on your best behavior or just not say anything.

On a side note, how the hell do you have so much time to chat? I think you talk more in one game than I do in ten.

Question if someone gets a final warning report and dose nothing like play the game at all until the end of the season?

Will the summoner be still in the red zone like one more strike? even after a new season starts?

Ohh and Riot Tantram confirm to me this, Are the ragers in control of the tribunal? All i have experienced for 3 years now are people trying to get me permanent banned and i have been unranked for 3 years to avoid unnecessarily Drama.


All I'm asking you is to confirm to me if you have permanent control and not the ragers as they say, they like to control ranked games and put people scared of them spamming reports against mostly the  summoners who just are trying but can't play right, This is my Endless issue.

I got my account perma banned for language and i really was having bad language but i had spent 20 dollars on this game there shoud be a different protocol for people who have paid money to the game. They shouldnt be able to be banned at all permanently i want my account unbanned and given a perma ban on chat.
Calling Riven retarded and flaming your team isnt "nothing"
The enemy team was super salty and saying how I'm bronze etc lmao. That's why I said "I'm done talking to those kids" They were being toxic af, but they report me 0 sense
Didn't flame my team. This riven was saying how he's retarded and how he fed vlad and that vlad isn't good so what I meant is "you're acting retarded"
Didn't flame my team. This riven was saying how he's retarded and how he fed vlad and that vlad isn't good so what I meant is "you're acting retarded"

"ProsDoPvP: this is a smurf" just go play on your smurf 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
High elo acc

1. How the hell do you talk so much in one game? This easily makes it harder on your team to carry you since you're obviously distracted.

2. No... you did nothing toxic... cept:

ProsDoPvP: RIVEN
ProsDoPvP: ARE

ProsDoPvP: yas lost lane and then roams im done lmao

ProsDoPvP: HEAL ME
ProsDoPvP: WTF

3. That's 5 events of that I can see are toxic just glancing at ur log. That's 59 lines of being toxic. And the first event I'd ban you just cause that's just something I don't want in this community and I think everyone agrees.

4. They got the right guy, go cry in the corner.
98% of what you just posted isn't "toxic" in any way.
This was a 50 min game lol. Also these are 2 separate games. fyi

> [{quoted}](name=ProsDoPvP,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PJOoFhZF,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-01-11T15:16:29.239+0000)
>
> This was a 50 min game lol. Also these are 2 separate games. fyi

And? Why were you talking the whole time? Obviously your gameplay suffered.
I barley talked that game, max I typed 500 words

Rofl... Most of the time im typing like 20 words in a whole game... probably less and I'm still fine.
Pings op.

Like please. I've spent so much time on this acc including over 300 USD. The actions weren't right, but I have stuff going on right now. Don't want to tell because im not going to use my life as a excuse. If its possible I would like this acc to be unbanned :(
Too late. Your chat restrictions & 14 days ban were already your 2nd chances, and you're still not planning to change your behavior anyway.

You know nothing about me. Except logs you see. You have no clue what's going on in my life. Etc how do you even know I'm not going to change? I've known how It feels to be banned.... Why would I risk being stupid again.

So you know what's going around in your hard & stressing life, then **why take it out on LoL?** Just so you know, LoL isn't a punching bag for you to take out your stress & frustration on.  

> how do you even know I'm not going to change? 

It's simple. You never did. You went through Chat restriction to 14 days ban, and then this. Tell me, where is that "change" you promised over these times? All I can say is that, it's too late for last promises, and the only way you can fulfill them is in your next new account.
I've haven't had a chat restriction.

You have had warnings, may it be temp bans or something else. The rioter has stated it
Your not getting unbanned. I don't care what's going on in your life, it doesn't give you any reason to be toxic
Good luck with that. That RARELY happens, like ever. No offense.

It depends, did you troll, throw matches and/or go afk often? If so, absolutely, in fact your account was never banned.

However, if your account was banned for using illegal words then no, those things are not allowed.
Never trolled, went afk a few times over these years, but not on purpose had to go to the store etc.

"had to go to store"

dude....no.

just use the old, "ma bad internet" this absolves you
You type too much.  If you make another account focus on your game play instead of chat and maybe you'll carry.

You where diffidently toxic, and worthy of punishment, although truthfully I have seen much worse. However, the way this system works, is your punishment gets increased in tiers. If your most recent punishment was a 14 day suspension, no matter what the next punishment will be a permanent ban. If you didn't reform after receiving other punishments, then you get a perma-ban, im very sorry :(
So how many previous punishments have you had?

Sadly you lost your validity as soon as you mentioned you had spent money like it would "protect" you from being banned... It doesn't. Sorry.

On to your logs... Which someone else will go over I bet.

Also I like how The Xin and Yas was literally instigating the whole thing, but they don't get reported it looked into? Calling me trash and how I'm plat. Saying I'm "boosted" like how would you feel about it? Worked hard to get high elo like that and get treated like crap???

> [{quoted}](name=ProsDoPvP,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=PJOoFhZF,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-01-11T13:57:30.550+0000)
>
> Also I like how The Xin and Yas was literally instigating the whole thing, but they don't get reported it looked into? Calling me trash and how I'm plat. Saying I'm "boosted" like how would you feel about it? Worked hard to get high elo like that and get treated like crap???

Instigating doesn't excuse you.
Plat is not high elo though. T_T

This is probably the least worthy perma ban I've ever seen.

Which is surprising because usually perma bans are issued for legitimately toxic players whereas this guy was... barely borderline a bit toxic slightly.  If I were Riot I'd rescind this perma ban but I am not Riot. I mean I understand that he had committed prior offenses but if they're on this level, that , in my opinion, does not justify a perma ban.

You don't give a guy the Death Penalty for Jaywalking 100 times. In my opinion.

First off, it doesn't matter how much money you spend on the game; you're required to follow the rules just like everybody else. From the [Tribunal FAQ](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2411284): 

>**Do paying players get leniency?**
>Paying customers are treated exactly the same as non-paying customers by the Tribunal.

Second off, you got a permaban because you refused to change your behavior after receiving at least 35-games worth of chat restrictions and a 2-week ban as well. Also, permabans are **ALWAYS** reviewed by a Riot employee personally, so they had to go through your entire account history and see that you had no intentions of reforming in order to decide that you needed to be permabanned from the game. It wasn't false reports that got you punished, nor was it just these 2 games either (reform cards never show every single game that you're valid reported in).

As for your chat logs in particular, here's what stands out to me as reportable: 

Game 1: 

>ProsDoPvP: seems a bit salty
ProsDoPvP: add some to my chips.

Can be taken as being a bit passive-aggressive here.

>ProsDoPvP: riven
ProsDoPvP: are you retarded?
ProsDoPvP: same
ProsDoPvP: RIVEN
ProsDoPvP: ARE
ProsDoPvP: U
ProsDoPvP: STUPID

Verbally harassing Riven: definitely reportable and punishable.

>ProsDoPvP: my team is brozne so ?
ProsDoPvP: team based game

Yes, it's a team based game, and you being passive-aggressive and harassing your teammates when they do something wrong is not being a team player. Also comments like the first one in this quote don't help matters at all whatsoever.

>ProsDoPvP: vlad carried you guys
ProsDoPvP: so tbh
ProsDoPvP: idk why you're talking
ProsDoPvP: no
ProsDoPvP: vlad carried you guys
ProsDoPvP: thats all.
ProsDoPvP: gg

This comes off as you being a sore loser and unsportsmanlike.

Game 2: 

Honestly I can't find much of anything that I or anyone else for that matter would hit punish for except for maybe these lines right here: 

>ProsDoPvP: lmao
ProsDoPvP: you're funny kid.

But even then it's a bit of a stretch there honestly.

Overall the attitude that you displayed in game 1 of the chat logs is the kind of behavior that got you punished in the first place. In terms of games alone I would punish for game one and pardon for game two, but for the case overall I would definitely hit punish just because of game one (1) alone (remember that it only takes one game to receive a punish verdict). Next time try asking politely and respectfully why someone did what they did, and if they start to act up then just mute and report them after the game has ended. Don't stoop down to their level though, as that's exactly what they want you to do.

TL;DR: You weren't punished for "doing nothing", you were punished for being passive-aggressive and verbally abusive to your teammates when they did stuff that you didn't like. Game 1 is definitely the worst example of the 2 games the reform card shows, but because you showed consistently negative behavior like the kind that game 1 showcases, and because you refused to heed the warnings of your 3 prior punishments before-hand, you received a permaban because of it. However much money you spend means nothing when it comes to your behavior. Also, someone else being a verbally abusive jerk doesn't give you the right to become one yourself. When you retaliate yourself you're forcing up to 8 other players in the game with you to put up with 2 raging jerks now instead of just one: the original and now you. If you don't have anything nice or constructive to say then just say nothing. I wish you the best of luck in all of your future endeavors.
Bit of advice: Read the [Terms of Service](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse)

"ProsDoPvP: im brnze

ProsDoPvP: or wut?
ProsDoPvP: report for?"

This is my favourite part when he plays "stupid" and pretends he's bronze so whatever he's doing (intentionally letting teammates die) looks like it's nothing. I've met players like this in game, when another player calls them Bronze they pretend they are and let them die.
No lmao. The Xin and Yas were saying I'm trash and bad so I was being  sarcastic  And saying I'm bronze.

You used the word retarded, also you mentioned you were smurfing. 
I would say that deserve a somewhat 1 or 2 weeks, even one month ban, not a perma ban tho, you haven't reached the highest level of toxic, after all.
But I'm not the one who makes decision, bad luck boy.
